title: 5/8/17 - Who owns you? (Gov.Greg Abbott Joins Glenn)
description:
Texas Governor Greg Abbott's leadership shines again ...What is a 'sanctuary city'? ...Texas Governor Greg Abbott joins Glenn to discuss the new Texas law to stop sanctuary cities in The Lone Star State ...Glenn's struggle to reconnect ...The difference between God's creations and man's creations ...Who owns you?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
